description:
Boss of the Dondenkai assassins` organisation who is bent on collecting the bounty for killing one http://anidb.net/ch141116 [Sakamoto Tarou].
It is revealed in episode 5 that he along with the rest of the orgnisation`s top brass met his demise by the hand of http://anidb.net/ch145348 [Slur].
name: Dondenkai no Boss
